entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is involved in the acquisition and management of various assets, as well as the recognition and measurement of contract assets and liabilities in a business combination.

entities.name: SOFTBANK
entities.description: SoftBank is a company that was involved in a terminated Share Purchase Agreement with NVIDIA.

entities.name: MELLANOX TECHNOLOGIES
entities.description: Mellanox Technologies, Ltd. is a supplier of high-performance interconnect products for computing, storage, and communications applications. It was acquired by NVIDIA in April 2020.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA and SoftBank had a Share Purchase Agreement which was terminated due to significant regulatory challenges.
NVIDIA acquired Mellanox Technologies, Ltd. in April 2020 for $7.13 billion to optimize data center workloads.
